alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 2:49PM AKST until January 29 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow and cold wind chills expected. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Winds gusting to 35 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. Visibility will be one half mile or less at times. Wind chills to 40 below. * WHERE...Steese Highway Summits. * WHEN...Until 6 AM Saturday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 35 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow over Steese Highway Summits. Cold wind chills as low as 40 below zero will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means periods of blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
